Kural_Info.Tamil_Text: கடனறிந்து காலங் கருதி இடனறிந்து எண்ணி உரைப்பான் தலை.
Kural_Info.English_Meaning: He is chief (among ambassadors) who understands the proper decorum (before foreign princes), seeks the (proper) occasion, knows the (most suitable) place, and delivers his message after (due) consideration.

Layered_Composition.Foreground: The chief of envoys ('தலை') is depicted as a master strategist, considering all variables before speaking.
Layered_Composition.Midground: Before him are four glowing symbols he must master: a scroll representing his Duty/Decorum ('கடன்'), a celestial clock for Time ('காலம்'), a topographical map for Place ('இடன்'), and an intricate, thinking brain for deep Consideration ('எண்ணி').
Layered_Composition.Background: Only after analyzing all four does he speak ('உரைப்பான்'), and his words are shown to be perfectly effective, achieving their diplomatic goal with flawless precision.

Art_Direction.Subject_and_Action: The chief among envoys is the one who delivers their message only after considering their duty, the right time, the right place, and the matter at hand with deep thought.
Art_Direction.Symbolic_Motifs: The four glowing symbols (scroll, clock, map, brain) represent the four prerequisites for perfect speech. The flawless result of his words shows the power of this comprehensive approach.
Art_Direction.Lighting_and_Color: A bright, clear, intellectual light. The four symbols glow with a light of pure strategy, guiding the envoy's speech.

Technical_Cues.Camera: A shot focusing on the envoy in their moment of deep consideration, surrounded by the four symbolic elements.
Technical_Cues.Resolution: 8K, with a high-tech or magical feel for the symbolic interface.
Technical_Cues.Art_Genre: Conceptual art, with a sci-fi or fantasy aesthetic.

Negative_Prompt: envoy speaking rashly, ignoring the symbols, text artifacts.
